column2: training with statements and questions in small batches of 4 lemmas. between batches
column3: alternate between only questions and only statements. train on frequent then infrequent batches. give only context as example sentence. for training: 30 high frequency
column5: all sumerian/emesal. test batch size = 20. no small mistake correction
column7: but negative reinforcement used in training. Example sentence masks turned off.
